title: CDC Says Schools Can Now Space Students 3 Feet Apart, Rather Than 6
content:
1. CDC Says Schools Can Now Space Students 3 Feet Apart, Rather Than 6  NPR
  2. Updated CDC guidance says 3 feet of physical distancing is safe in schools  CNN
  3. Dr. Fauci reveals if 3 feet or 6 feet is better for social distancing  Deseret News
  4. COVID science, CDC hints point to full-time, in-person school  Los Angeles Times
  5. CDC to change school social distancing guidelines as metro Detroit schools deal with outbreaks  WXYZ-TV Detroit | Channel 7
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 疾控中心称学校现在可以让学生间隔3英尺，而不是6英尺。
疾控中心稱學校現在可以讓學生間隔3英尺，而不是6英尺。
